statements: DELETE FROM patient_lab_test_results WHERE test_name = 'Blood Glucose Test';
DELETE FROM patient_lab_test_results WHERE test_name='Blood Test' AND test_date='2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM patient_lab_test_results WHERE patient_id=100 AND test_result > 50;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM lab_results WHERE patient_id = 2 AND test_result < 5.0;
DELETE FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date < '2022-01-01' AND test_result <= 50
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date < '2022-03-15' AND patient_id = 100
DELETE FROM doctors WHERE doctor_name='Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM lab_tests WHERE test_id = 100 AND result = 'Positive';
